sources.title: Restricted Area | Full Survival Horror Movie | Happy Halloween
sources.description:
***This film is under license from ITN Distribution. All rights reserved.***

Restricted Area - Four blue-collar friends, recently laid off from the steel mill, take one last camping trip into the wilderness when they discover a backwoods cult with a cataclysmic agenda and must fight to survive.

2019
Stars: Paige Lindsay Betts, Phillip Andre Botello, Ross Britz

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
